meanings.definition: Food purchased from a restaurant or store to be eaten elsewhere.
meanings.sent1: I love getting carryouts from my favorite restaurant for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She picked up some carryouts for the picnic at the park.
meanings.sent3: The carryouts from the bakery made the party a hit!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the carryouts filled the room, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The carryouts were so delicious, they disappeared in minutes.

meanings.definition: The act of taking something away from a place.
meanings.sent1: His carryouts of books from the library were heavy but worth it.
meanings.sent2: The carryouts of supplies from the warehouse were carefully organized.
meanings.sent3: The carryouts of toys from the playroom surprised the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her carryouts of memories from the old house were bittersweet.
meanings.sent5: The carryouts of sand from the beach left a trail behind.

meanings.definition: A business that provides takeout food.
meanings.sent1: The new carryouts in town offer a variety of cuisines.
meanings.sent2: We ordered from the carryouts down the street for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The carryouts on wheels arrived just in time for the event.
meanings.sent4: The carryouts with the catchy name became popular quickly.
meanings.sent5: The carryouts with the special deals always draw a crowd.
